content: right needle times you should have 36 stitches on your needles ribbing row 25 row 1-7 *p1 k3* repeat 8 more times p1 k2 p1 k2…continue around until you row 26 reach stich marker *k2tog* repeat * 8 more times row 8 increase row you should have 18 stitches on your needles *p1 k2 kfb k2 pm* repeat until you reach row 27 stitch marker *k2tog* repeat till the end of row you should have 9 cable sections 63 stitches you should have 9 stitches on your needles row 9 *p1 k6* repeat 8 more times cut at least an 8 tail and with your yarn needle weave through all remaining stitches hat body - cables to finish off hat cable row 1 *p1 cf6* repeat 8 more times finishing row 2 7 6 row cut yarn and weave in all ends *p1 k6* repeat 8 more times finish with a large yarn pompom or faux fur cable row 8 pompom *p1 cf6* repeat 8 more times row 9 14 6 row *p1 k6* repeat 8 more times cable row 15 *p1 cf6* repeat 8 more times row 16 21 6 row *p1 k6* repeat 8 more times | statement junkie | gimme all the cables toque - january 2019 ã| version 5 - january 24 | 2
